article_title: Three new species of ‘Dwarf Dragon’ discovered in South America
article_text: Three new species of dragon-like creatures have been discovered in the Andean cloud forests of Ecuador and Peru. The new species of wood-lizards – called Enyalioides altotambo, Enyalioides anisolepis and Enyalioides sophiarothschildae – were discovered in an area described by conservation group Critical Ecosystem Partnership Fund as “the global epicentre of biodiversity” with “20,000 plants found…

og.title: Three new species of ‘Dwarf Dragon’ discovered in South America

article_summary:
Three new species of dragon-like creatures have been discovered in the Andean cloud forests of Ecuador and Peru.
The new species of wood-lizards – called Enyalioides altotambo, Enyalioides anisolepis and Enyalioides sophiarothschildae – were discovered in an area described by conservation group Critical Ecosystem Partnership Fund as “the global epicentre of biodiversity” with “20,000 plants found…
